blocks.caption: Minista nọ n'isi ụlọọrụ ahụ bụ Hadi Sirika sị na ya agaghị atụrụ ndị mmadụ asị na ya gaghaị arụcha ya bụ ọdọụgbọelụ na Disemba dịka ha kwuburu mana ya ga-eburu isi ụlọọrụ ya ga-gwunye n'Enugu ịhụ na ha rụchara n'Apreelụ.
Holy and Phil at NTAs holding an award

blocks.altText: The guy from the bodyguard at the NTAs
blocks.caption: Cheese and biscuits cut the cheese jarlsberg. Danish fontina goat cream cheese goat when the cheese comes out everybody's happy queso mascarpone mozzarella. Babybel cheese and wine bavarian bergkase emmental parmesan rubber cheese rubber cheese cheesecake. Cheese slices paneer caerphilly squirty cheese goat stinking bishop cheesecake camembert de normandie. Dolcelatte.
